website_summaries.verdict: This attractively patterned set is comfortable and lightweight. We love the decorative embroidery on the pillow.
pros: Includes a comforter, two king shams, one bed skirt, one flat sheet, one fitted sheet, two pillowcases, one decorative pillow
Users find this set generously sized and pleasant to the touch
cons: Vibrant colors can wash out over time

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for our guestroom!
customer_reviews.text: This set is gorgeous! Comfortable, high quality....the sheet set is a bit scratchy, but a few washes and some extra fabric softener should smooth them out a bit. The comforter and shams are very soft and cozy and the accent pillow is very nice as well. Excellent choice for our guest room and compliments the decor nicely....also, for what you get, can't beat the price! AWESOME DEAL!!! Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: MElise

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, quality bedding
customer_reviews.text: I love this bed set!!!! I have been wanting this bedding set for months ever since I had seen it at Kohls. Unfortunately Kohls wanted too much. So when they had their last sale I got the idea to check Amazon. I am so glad I did!!! Not only did they have the color I wanted, but it was $50.00 cheaper than their sale price. Great quality and beautiful colors. Would recommend this lovely addition to my bedroom to everyone.
customer_reviews.author: c

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful but not big enough
customer_reviews.text: I don't know what size is pictured but it isn't the full. Check the other product pictures before you buy if you want to see the true fit! I didn't look and now wish I had. I was really disappointed that the comforter BARELY covers my mattress. I'm getting rid of this comforter after having only had it a few months. It's a shame cause it's beautiful color but it's a pain every morning trying to tug it into just the right place to where it covers the mattress. Really wasn't worth the money for how it looks on my bed and the aggravation that comes with it.
customer_reviews.author: Maggybeths

customer_reviews.title: Very comfy bed set
customer_reviews.text: Very comfy bedding set I thought this was a comforter only then I was surprised after receiving it and realized it was a bed in a bag I washed the sheets prior to first use this softened them up a little these breathe a lot so I don't sweat when I sleep as much and help keep me cool at night so I really like that This is my new favorite bedding set I bought the taupe color and it looks really nice on my bed I make my bed everyday now because it looks so nice
customer_reviews.author: chaz

customer_reviews.title: Recommended
customer_reviews.text: Received on right time and package was well protected. Quality is good. Value for money spend. Its my 2nd year I have been using this. No issues so far. I do recommend this sincerely. Appreciate much if you could provide a response if you feel this review is helpful. I’m trying to be honest in my review.
customer_reviews.author: Jose C

customer_reviews.title: Great buy, I love my set!
customer_reviews.text: We have washed the comforter several times now and have no complaints! As other people have said, the sheets are a little stiff, but nothing that bothered me. In fact, I feel like the sheets felt more crisp and clean. They have become a little softer after some washings with fabric softener, but like I said, it didn't bother me much before. I love the colors! We've had this set for about 5 months now, and I just really like it. We've had compliments on the design from people that have come to see our house. I'm happy with the purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Robin MS

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a teenager's bedroom or dorm.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for a teenager's bedroom, dorm or guestroom. Not for a master bedroom. Not high-end-looking (but for the price, it's to be expected). Love the colorful print (purchased the aqua) and, for the price, you get a lot of items for not a lot of money. Looks really nice, but once you touch and feel the fabric you can tell it is not good quality. I'd still come back and buy different colors (all are very pretty) only to use in my son's bedroom, so I don't have to worry about him spilling anything or accidentally ruining his comforter.
customer_reviews.author: ACHA

customer_reviews.title: not impressed
customer_reviews.text: Was so disappointed in this comforter and sheets. Comforter too hot. will have to save for Winter. Sheets I donated. were junk after washing them. Awful. went to walmart and bought the embossed microfiber sheet set. so impressed. Will keep comforter cause it matches my bedroom decor. will not buy from this company again. low quality
customer_reviews.author: Ali Blair

customer_reviews.title: Shrinks A LOT when washed
customer_reviews.text: I REALLY wanted to love this set, and I did.... at first. When we got it, we tried it on our bed (cal-king) to make sure it would fit and it was perfect. The sheets were very scratchy, but I figured that was just starch for packaging reasons and it would wash out. The sheets got a little softer when washed, but the set also shrunk so much it is now unusable on our bed. And yes, we followed the washing instructions on the set. Most things shrink a little when washed, but this set shrinks A LOT. It is terribly disappointing because it looks BEAUTIFUL, but now the comforter barely fits, and the sheets are worthless...
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful. Comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: The pattern is beautiful, the comforter is not too heavy so you can use it in warmer weather and now be too hot, but it still holds up well in winter. I wish the back wasn’t solid yellow and maybe a grey color, but that’s just preference. I feel like the comforter could be a few inches wider, but it hasn’t caused a problem with sleeping, it just looks small when the bed is made.
customer_reviews.author: Felicia Roose

customer_reviews.title: Soooo Off  Center!
customer_reviews.text: If u r a person who notices things like patterns being WAAYYYY off center, then be careful buying this Looks like all the Fulls and Twins in yellow at least are so off center to just drive me crazy. Returning the Full in yellow and ordering another HOPING it will be centered, but by all the photos in these reviews, they are ALL off center. Am I the only person to notice this? And be bugged by it? I mean, it's a BOLD pattern in BRIGHT higher contrast colors so really HAS TO BE CENTERED, especially since the bed is THE focal point of the room! Sorry for the caps, just so frustrated!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa.

customer_reviews.title: Great price, good quality, perfect colors, soft and comfortable, and fast ship!
customer_reviews.text: This comforter set was even better than expected! I didn't anticipate the matching bed shirt, which was also included (it was stated in the description, just missed it). love, Love, LOVE this set; so much so, I also purchased a matching coverlet set (lighter weight quilt) for matching chaise in my bedroom. As many reviewers have indicated, the sheets are a bit scratchy out of the packaging; when I purchased, I wasn't intending to use the sheets in the set as sheets anyway (I like a higher thread count.) Will make more accent pillows from the the sheets. The comforter, however, is super-soft and the perfect weight. Couldn't be happier with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Haan

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful but bad stitching
customer_reviews.text: Upon opening this up I was immediately in love ! The colors are vibrant and perfect for what I was looking for ! Then I washed it ........ I machine washed it alone and cold on the setting for bedding on my washer then put in the dryer on low ( per instructions on the bedding label) . The stuffing on the inside of the comforter is bunched together now and seems crunchy and the stitching is coming out ! Very disappointed in what I thought was a great purchase
customer_reviews.author: Cait Nobel

customer_reviews.title: Did not match description or photo
customer_reviews.text: Purchased the taupe because the description said it had grey in the design and photo looked like there was grey in the design. No grey, just taupe and brown. It’s pretty if you have brown/taupe bedroom. Does not match my room at all. Was looking for the taupe to accent the grey. From reading the other comments about how much it costs to return it, I am not sure I will send it back. Probably will donate it to Good Will.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Mann

customer_reviews.title: Super elegant style and vibrant colors!
customer_reviews.text: Really cute, true to the photo, I bought the green and blue pattern; I love earthy pastel colors, blue and green being my favorite. My room theme has always been blue and green and other light colors. If you are trying to follow a pattern scheme these sheets are perfect. Very soft too. (The photos don’t do it justice it looks much nicer in person.)
customer_reviews.author: Shaylen Sanders

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful bedding ensemble
customer_reviews.text: I don't often write reviews, but I wanted to let other shoppers know that I love this bedding. I bought it for my guest room and it is absolutely beautiful. The comforter is thick so cold nights will be warm. The sheets are soft (at least to me). The colors are vibrant. Shipping was fast. I am very glad I bought this bedding.
customer_reviews.author: Cori Foxworthy

customer_reviews.title: Beware, big return shipping costs if you don't like
customer_reviews.text: This was a pretty nice bedspread at a good price. However, it just didn't look good in my bedroom. I wanted to return it, but unfortunately it'd cost me more than 70% of the cost to return it. Now I wish I never even bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn J Gallant

customer_reviews.title: High quality bedset, classy design, pretty color combo.
customer_reviews.text: I am so pleased with this bedset! It fits wells and is a pretty design and a good color combo. However, it's not too pretty that my husband thinks it's too feminine. 😊 I have washed it a few times, and all is well so far. I only wish the bed skirt strapped on somehow so that it stays in place when I am making the bed. Overall, a great product!
customer_reviews.author: Nicola

customer_reviews.title: Lovely set. Well made.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this set for a guest room. It's quite lovely. The colors are vibrant. I loved that it included the shams, pillow cases, and the adorable accent pillow. It pulls it altogether. I bought a coordinating throw separately for a little splash of color on top. The set feels thick and well made. The sheets fit our deep mattress which we sometimes have issues with. I am pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Cosmicethos

customer_reviews.title: Looks Good Doesn’t Feel Good
customer_reviews.text: The colors of this comforter are great in my guest room. I knew I was purchasing an “economical” set but the sheets are rough; very scratchy. I will have to replace them for the comfort of my guests. Regarding the size of the comforter, it’s not full enough, neither in length or width. Overall, it looks good, doesn’t feel good & is not as full as most Queen sized comforters I’ve purchased in the past.
customer_reviews.author: Bshopper

customer_reviews.title: Cute and comfy comforter but super scratchy sheets
customer_reviews.text: The comforter and the pillow cases that match the comforter are great, but the sheets and the pillow cases that match the sheet are terrible. I was hoping they would soften up after washing with fabric softer but they were just as scratchy. Unlike any set of sheets I’ve ever purchased. Ended up ordering some new sheets. Decided to keep the set though because I love the design and colors of the comforter enough to still rate this purchase 4 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffanee

customer_reviews.title: DID NOT FIT AT ALL
customer_reviews.text: This set was labeled for a Queen bed. I bought it and saved it until I had redone the bedroom and this did not even come close to fitting my queen bed. Now the window has closed for returning this item and I have no double beds in which to use this set in my home. I would love to return/exchange. Never had a problem with anything from Amazon until this and I am beyond disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Tonya

customer_reviews.title: Beauty and the sheets
customer_reviews.text: This is a pretty set. The design is nice. The only thing keeping it from being five stars is that it feels kind of cheap. The sheets are scratchy, like they are composed of old pieces of cardboard. If you are going to put in a guest room, it’s great, and will lay beautifully. However, if you’re going to use as a main spread, perhaps buy separate sheets.
customer_reviews.author: Roninszeal

customer_reviews.title: Great disappointment.
customer_reviews.text: Extremely disappointed. I ordered a king size and expected the comforter and pillow covers would fit my king size bed as it is pictured rather than KING SIZED COMFORTER AND PILLOW COVERS displayed on a California King or even possibly a double bed. Sadly I made the mistake by assuming this would be the standard quality of fabric we have come to expect. Ah, the good old days, cheap 100 percent cotton with instructions to wash in cool water and DO NOT IRON. I have not seen this quality of fabric for decades.
customer_reviews.author: Karmi

customer_reviews.title: Read before buying King Size!
customer_reviews.text: Wish I would have read the reviews. The king is not standard size. It’s too small and isn’t long enough on the sides. Also disappointed in the material, feels like paper. Will use it for awhile until I can find something else on beige and gray.
customer_reviews.author: Strumolo Family

customer_reviews.title: Sheets wrinkle something fierce!
customer_reviews.text: The comforter and pillows and whatnot are great! Wash and dry beautifully! The sheets are TERRIBLE! The top sheet is too small in my opinion to be considered Queen size and they wrinkle so bad. SO. BAD. Disappointing because otherwise the set is lovely and I'm not about to iron sheets, not that that would smooth them out anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Pam Cakes

customer_reviews.title: I’d buy it again
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice comforter for the price point. No off putting smells out of the bag and it came with a sheet set, pillow shams and a decorative pillow. Walmart quality but maybe a step up. The color is just like it appears on the internet.
customer_reviews.author: Cris B.

customer_reviews.title: Sheets sized wrong
customer_reviews.text: Bought this set to fit a full size mattress/box spring combo mattress. Comforter was good sized and would have fit perfectly. Sheets would have had a hard time fitting on a twin size mattress. Also came in missing a pillowcase. Don’t know if this is the way they all are, or someone packed the wrong size sheets in the set.
customer_reviews.author: Tdalton

customer_reviews.title: Folded back up and returned as soon as I put it on the bed
customer_reviews.text: This comforter feels very cheap and not warm. Colors were MUCH brighter than shown in the picture with the grayish accent actually being bright aqua. Was quite disappointed and didn't even try the sheets.
customer_reviews.author: bjk

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money!!!
customer_reviews.text: First time I put in washer cycle on gentle ripped, poorly made not worth
customer_reviews.author: emilyl

customer_reviews.title: So far, so very good!
customer_reviews.text: I personally love this set!! I have my eyes on the blue one next. I got the taupe color on sale last year and this set has been nothing but amazing! After so many times that I’ve washed them and my dog who likes to play on my bed and scratch the sheets, it has not ripped at all. I waited one whole year to write this review because I wanted to see if this set would last pass 6 months and it certainly did. Like I said that blue set is my next on the list! It brings a touch of color to your boring room!
customer_reviews.author: Jackie :)

customer_reviews.title: Sunny beautiful bed!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this. Very good quality with both the comforter and sheets. AFTER WASHING EDIT: I washed it today for the first time and IT'S RUINED. Just a standard cold water wash. All of the stuffing matted together and became hard a crunchy. The blanket is wrinkled beyond fixing and all the stuffing is in different places. I am so disappointed. I really loved this set.
customer_reviews.author: Robyn Hosier

customer_reviews.title: Not wide enough!
customer_reviews.text: Only give this a 2 star since it is too narrow for cover sides of the king size bed. It is not like I have this super deep pillow top crazy mattress so usually I am safe buying comforters and they cover down to the bottom edge of mattress!
customer_reviews.author: rommasmomma

customer_reviews.title: Too small and cheap
customer_reviews.text: It was definitely smaller than a full. I had to tug so hard to get the fitted sheet on, and the corners are bunched up. The comforter and flat sheet barely cover the mattress. The comforter bunched up in places after drying.
customer_reviews.author: Jason M.

customer_reviews.title: Not really as gray as the photo
customer_reviews.text: I do love this set for it's softness and for the color of the solid side; however, I bought it because both sides were supposed to be a variety of grays and beige, but the patterned side is more mocha and other browns, and not grays. Using it for now, but will look for something in person and not off of a photo.
customer_reviews.author: Judi

customer_reviews.title: Think twice
customer_reviews.text: It's not the best worth about 35-40 dollars washed the sheets crumpled into a ball not great quality disappointed I used my reward points to get cheaper still overpriced for quality
customer_reviews.author: Deb

customer_reviews.title: Ripped during 1st Wash
customer_reviews.text: Washed this once - followed the care instructions and it ripped apart along than more than one seem !! Total waste of money it was nice while it lasted .
customer_reviews.author: Nina Odeh

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: Not what I expected. I tried to return but gotta pay for my own return for something I don’t want. The colors aren’t as vibrant as shown it’s to light and more of a pink versus coral.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Not soft
customer_reviews.text: So first of all this comforter is light weight. The sheets that come with it are very low quality. The thread count is so low you can basically see through the sheets. They are 100% cotton which is nice but so scratchy they need to be washed many times before becoming soft. The over all look of the bedding is nice, its just not the quality I was hoping for.
customer_reviews.author: Nic E

customer_reviews.title: Very Pretty
customer_reviews.text: Overall I really love this set. The colors are so vivid. The comforter is very soft. The sheets are a little rough, I wish they were the same material as the shams. My bed skirt was also ripped, but I was able to make it work. Happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.author: Ams

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: This is such a good bed set! The sheets are really nice especially the flat one. I love all the colors. The comforter is super warm and soft. It’s just good quality all around.
customer_reviews.author: Fugala'au K Fitisemanu

customer_reviews.title: Pretty, but runs small & sheets are rough
customer_reviews.text: Very bright and beautiful colors, but run very small! I have a king bed and wanted a larger comforter so I got the California king. The bedskirt is too small to use and comforter barely covers the top of the mattress. Sheets fit tight and are a beautiful pattern but scratchy & rough. If it wasn’t for the covid19 shutdown I’d return it, but the colors are cute!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Our favorite!
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to receive these in the mail! They are so pretty! And they match my husband's and I's room perfectly! One thing I wasn't a fan of is that the comforter is super warm. I get hot easily but my husband uses the comforter and he has no complaints! Would buy again and would check to see what other colors are available!
customer_reviews.author: Missy

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed...
customer_reviews.text: I was not impressed with this bed set at all.. color is not true to the picture, sheets are thick and not the greatest material. Not impreed with material on comforter or pillow shams either. I've had it a couple months and the threads unraveling already. It gets the job done but the quality is not good. I would not buy or recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: The quality is excellent
customer_reviews.text: This comforters set over all is phenomenon love it the texture and the quality is excellent I would highly recommend this set in it's a beautiful color I enjoy it as well as my family
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful but quality is disappointing
customer_reviews.text: This comforter set is beautiful. But BEWARE!!!! After the first wash the set got completely faded ever after following the wash instructions! The sheets were ruined and the comforter became lumpy with large faded spots. I loved the print and it was very soft and lightweight, however, the quality is definitely not durable and very cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Light and Pretty
customer_reviews.text: Very pretty. Very light comforter. Much lighter than my previous one. Some of the stitching on comforter is sloppy. Overall, I do like it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Colors and size are exact (queen)
customer_reviews.text: The colors are identical as pictured. The queen size sheets fit perfect and I have an additional quilted pad. The bedshirt fit well also. This is all after a warm water wash.
customer_reviews.author: christine

customer_reviews.title: Awesome colors and pattern
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love the color and the pattern. The only downside is after washing it still isn’t as soft as I’d like. I’m sure with time it will get softer
customer_reviews.author: K. Buratt

customer_reviews.title: Decent, nice comforter for the price
customer_reviews.text: This is a good comforter set for the price. It's not a delux comforter but it's has a nice look.
customer_reviews.author: dizneygirlfriend

customer_reviews.title: Great comfroter, sheets are not soft!
customer_reviews.text: I love the look and feel of the comforter but the sheets are not great. I washed them before I used them but that did not seem to help. Very scratchy!! Maybe after a few more washes they will get better. The shams and accent pillow are a cute addition to the set. I did not use the bed skirt so I can't comment on it. For the price I'm happy.
customer_reviews.author: Mamajo218

customer_reviews.title: Very Soft Comforter
customer_reviews.text: I love this comforter! It is very soft and goes well with my bedroom furniture. The sheets are not near as soft as I prefer, but hopefully will soften with each wash.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan Hemaya

customer_reviews.title: I smelled horrible and can't handle a wash.
customer_reviews.text: It smelled terrible out of the packaging and I washed it in my brand new washer by itself with oxyclean, transferred it to my new dryer immediately and it still smelled terrible. Not only did it smell terrible but the stuffing inside it turned solid, I did not over dry it. It's very itchy. I like the way it looked at first but this was a terrible purchase.
customer_reviews.author: amber clayton

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT
customer_reviews.text: We love it-it's nice-perfect all the colors we wanted in our bed room.thank you
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the most comfortable bed sets we have had. The sheets are thicker and made of good quality. They aren't as soft but they are great!
customer_reviews.author: Reanna

customer_reviews.title: comforter is soft
customer_reviews.text: love the feel of the this comforter the sheets that come with it are not so soft.
customer_reviews.author: scrawfordtiger48

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: It's prettier in person. I thought it might be too dizzy looking since I'm not too much into patterns, but its not at all. Its actually very nice! Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Nicki

customer_reviews.title: Great comforter!
customer_reviews.text: The sheet set was not soft but the comforter itself is! Once you wash the sheets a few times they get soft! But pretty set for the cost!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Davenport

customer_reviews.title: So Comfortable & Looks Great
customer_reviews.text: My wife absolutely loves this bedset. Very soft and warm, yet doesn’t make you overheat at night. We love it so much! The sheets are similar to T-Shirt material... which is nice & light. Definitely a good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Devon

customer_reviews.title: Soft and cozy
customer_reviews.text: Not exactly thrilled with the included sheet set. It’s kind of crunchy. I’m used to higher thread count but the comforter is amazing. Soft, cozy and washed (and dried) beautifully. I’m shopping now for another one made by the same company.
customer_reviews.author: Marisa

customer_reviews.title: Good deal!
customer_reviews.text: I believe for the price this is a good deal. The skirt fits well and the fabric on the comforter and shams is very sleek. Only reason I did not give 5 stars is because sheets feel a little rough for my taste, hopefully after a few washes that will change!
customer_reviews.author: roxanne bennett

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase
customer_reviews.text: The package came very quickly and I’m very satisfied with the purchase. Great quality for the price. Soft and yet warm for the cold months to come! The colors are bright but not too bright, and adds great flare to the room. Love the pillow as well.
customer_reviews.author: Ayano N.

customer_reviews.title: Don’t hesitate. Just buy!
customer_reviews.text: It’s soft. It’s beautiful. It’s everything I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie H.

customer_reviews.title: Is not even close to true in size...
customer_reviews.text: It's a nice bedspread but the reason I ultimately gave it 2 stars is because we ordered the California king and it does not even come close to covering our king size bed. The sheets do not fit and the comforter can only hang down fully on one side. The other side shows the whole mattress.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Martin

customer_reviews.title: Great set great price
customer_reviews.text: Very nice bedset at a great price for everything that is included it in. We love the color and pattern. The only problem we have had is that it is very hard to get stains out of the fabric on the sheets and comforter.
customer_reviews.author: T. Kuczynski

customer_reviews.title: Very good choice-love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love this comforter set. It is thick and fluffy but lightweight. This set does include a very cute sheet set in a coordinating pattern on a soft, smooth material. The comforter is a soft "brushed silk" and colors are slighted muted, making it seem like a well loved favorite. I washed on gentle before using and had no problems. Love it!!
customer_reviews.author: TSM

customer_reviews.title: Does not wash well.
customer_reviews.text: Loved it, until I washed it. Followed the directions and it is a big lumpy mess now. I will not be buying this brand again.
customer_reviews.author: Deb

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with this bedding. The color is bold, beautiful and steadfast. The fabric is soft and substantial. This is well constructed. I am so delighted that I purchased another set from the same manufacturer.
customer_reviews.author: Cate

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: It came with holes in it pure junk don’t waste your money
customer_reviews.author: David W Hackler

customer_reviews.title: Good comforter
customer_reviews.text: I really like this comforter just because its light weight and love the design. I just wish it was softer and had a cozier feel to it but otherwise its good
customer_reviews.author: Cassandra Sylvia

customer_reviews.title: Truly Wonderful!!
customer_reviews.text: Truly Wonderful!!! My husband and I love the the way the comforter looks and feels. Our room looks very cozy and the comforter's colors are beautiful. The size fits perfect on our queen bed. The order arrived sooner than I expected. I'm 100% happy with my purchase. I will order soon for my son's bedroom. We also love the price!!!
customer_reviews.author: Monica Kalina

customer_reviews.title: Overall pleased with this set
customer_reviews.text: It was a little rough at first, but after washing with fabric softener it's perfect. We're very pleased with this comforter set and would buy again. It's a beautiful pattern as well.
customer_reviews.author: Sheena Moran

customer_reviews.title: Pretty and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Pretty and comfortable! The subdued colors of the grey/taupe combined with the cool design were exactly what I was going for. Very happy with this purchase! I read a few people said the sheets were scratchy. On night one, I would agree. By night three there were much better and I'm sure after a wash or two will be fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: I love the decorative comforter and pillows, they are perfect for my decor , however the sheets that come along with them are not soft, just mediocre. If you are picky, I would recommend investing in some better quality sheets.
customer_reviews.author: Ashlei

customer_reviews.title: Defective fitted sheet
customer_reviews.text: I just received this set. I love the pattern and the feel of it. BUT THE FITTED SHEET IS DEFECTIVE! it’s a queen set. Eerythjng else fits fine fitted sheet -one side fits snug other side I can’t even hook the last corner. Not happy.
customer_reviews.author: Sandi mercier

customer_reviews.title: Very thin
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Colors are nice, fits the mattress well Cons: too thin (good for summer), not soft or comfy even after multiple washes
customer_reviews.author: Mandy

customer_reviews.title: Great Colors
customer_reviews.text: The comforter has great colors and is very warn. The sheets aren't the softest but they look great. The combination brightens the rooms and adds a lot of color and life.
customer_reviews.author: BigChicken

customer_reviews.title: CHEAP - HARSH - LIKE SANDPAPER on your skin
customer_reviews.text: Looks great - but fabric quality and thread count make this the most abrasive and uncomfortable ever experienced. Hard to believe a company would make something like this!
customer_reviews.author: uthaman

customer_reviews.title: The dominant color is Gray, not Taupe!
customer_reviews.text: Love this comforter set, but the primary color is definitely gray. It is referred to as taupe and I fully expected that gray would be a secondary color. The entire back of the comforter is solid gray. The dust ruffle is solid gray. So if you want a gray comforter set this one is very nice. Lightweight, soft material. Very comfortable. Very pretty.
customer_reviews.author: linda hageman

customer_reviews.title: Does not maintain quality when washed!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this comforter set and it was beautiful. I laundered it exactly as the directions said and it melted my entire comforter and it’s ruined. I got one week out of it and I’m very disappointed in the quality. I feel this should be a refund!
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa Reed

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality after first wash.
customer_reviews.text: The comforter ripped in the corner after my very first wash out of the package. Washed on delicate using cold water as instructed by manufacturer. Did not even get to experience sleeping on it. I’ve had better luck with sets from local department stores. Very disappointing. I will not be ordering from this brand again. 0/5 rating.
customer_reviews.author: maqkeia bess

customer_reviews.title: Very nice set for the price...
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful cheerful bedroom set. Sheets are a little rougher than the quit material but a few washes and fabric softener will be fine.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Czechowski

customer_reviews.title: Cheap cheap CHEAP
customer_reviews.text: The sheets are useless. The comforter is even scratchy. The only positive is the pattern.
customer_reviews.author: atlanta

customer_reviews.title: Bold color and ulta modern
customer_reviews.text: I did end up returning this product, only because the colors were way more vibrant than what I was looking for. It did seems very well made, and beautiful coloring if you are going for a more vibrant/modern look.
customer_reviews.author: shoppingmama

customer_reviews.title: Color is way off!
customer_reviews.text: I got the taupe one in the mail today and was very disappointed. The pictures make it look like it has both gray and taupe and the colors are more cool-toned, which is why I wanted this one. In person, it’s all browns with no gray whatsoever. It’s also very warm tone. I’m very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Allison

customer_reviews.title: Vibrant Color Set
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this comforter. I have been looking for the perfect color scheme for a comforter for about a year. The colors are vibrant and you can also incorporate other solid color pillows to enhance the look. I also love the sheet and pillow case set that comes with the comforter. This is a great deal for the price of a Cal King comforter set.
customer_reviews.author: Regina

customer_reviews.title: very colorful
customer_reviews.text: I like it but the coloring is a bit bold. I am getting used to it. There is one concern. I got 2 different shams...1 with a ruffle and dark coloring and the other sham without a ruffle and light coloring. This is not what is shown in the picture.
customer_reviews.author: Emma Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Brightens my room
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful. Soft. My children said it looked like we now lived in a fancy hotel! Ha. Would purchase again. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Kjhammy

customer_reviews.title: Looks just like the pictures.
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful right out of the package. Looks great on the bed and fits perfectly. Washed and dried per instructions, came out a bit wrinkled. No complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Bedspread
customer_reviews.text: Used it for a spare bedroom. Love the look and feel...
customer_reviews.author: c. rager

customer_reviews.title: but Im pretty disappointed to say the least
customer_reviews.text: Washed the comforter when I got it, and it was ruined in the dryer. Probably should have air dried it, but Im pretty disappointed to say the least. Colors were bright, comforter seems a little on the cheap side. Sheets are a little rough, wish I would have got a nice comfy pair of sheets instead.
customer_reviews.author: Joe F

customer_reviews.title: Super Cheap Material
customer_reviews.text: This set is made of cheap, rough material. The sheets felt like sand paper and the comforter was not much better. Plus the stitching on the comforter was coming apart when I opened the box.
customer_reviews.author: Emily W

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful but...
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful set. My only issue is the the pattern is off, so when it's on the bed it's either way over to one side to fix it, or just off in the center.
customer_reviews.author: Alvaro Estrada

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: The colors and style were perfect. Material better than expected. The sheets were soft and crisp at the same time.
customer_reviews.author: Cat

customer_reviews.title: Love this
customer_reviews.text: Love this set. Get a lot of bang for the price. Looks great put all together. Set me room up exactly as pictured, curtains and paint. Looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Layton

customer_reviews.title: Quality comforter set
customer_reviews.text: This comforter set came as advertised. It is a pretty set and seems to be made of quality material.
customer_reviews.author: Sasha

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter for Christmas. She LOVES it
customer_reviews.author: M. Cox

customer_reviews.title: This bed set is beautiful and SOOO comfortable
customer_reviews.text: This bed set is beautiful and SOOO comfortable!! I was a little worried it would be kinda cheap because of the price but I love it!! It’s made very nicely and is so soft.
customer_reviews.author: Suzie Blahnick

customer_reviews.title: Very cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: Very cheap!!! I washed this when I got it and it nearly fell apart in the wash. The basing inside is all twisted and doesn’t lay right. Already looking for a new one because this is not going to work
customer_reviews.author: Macy B.

customer_reviews.title: soft and sweet
customer_reviews.text: These sheets are amazing. Super light for my husband who gets hot at night. Also it seems like these sheets repel stains. I'm sure it's my imagination but my husband spilt something and you couldn't even tell!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda hayes

product_meta.title: Madison Park Essentials Cozy Bag Comforter, Medallion Damask Design All Season Down Alternative Complete Sheet Set, Bed Skirt, Cal King(104"x92"), Serenity Coral, 9 Piece
product_meta.description: Size:Cal King(104"x92")| Color:Serenity CoralFor A Modern Update To Your Space, The Madison Park Essentials Serenity Complete Bed And Sheet Set Can Provide A Whole New Look With Warm Colors. An Intricate Medallion Pattern Repeats Across The Top Of Bed With Shades Of Coral And Aqua Playing Up This Oversized Print. An Oblong Pillow Uses Decorative Embroidery And Piecing To Create Texture On The Top Of Bed While 180 Thread Count Cotton Sheets Feature A Grey Medallion Print To Complete This Look.
feature_bullets: Madison Park Essentials Serenity Complete Bed In a Bag can provide a whole new look with warm colors.
An intricate medallion pattern of damask design complemented with subtle color contrast for calming ambiance
Microfiber fabric is a really soft fabric that is naturally wrinkle and shrinkage resistant.

Set includes: 1 Comforter: 104"W x 92"L, 2 King Shams: 20"W x 36"L + 2"D, 1 Bed Skirt: 72"W x 84"L + 15"D, 1 Flat Sheet: 108"W x 102"L, 1 Fitted Sheet: 72"W x 84"L + 14"D, 2 King Pillowcases: 20"W x 40"L + 2"D, 1 Decorative Pillow: 12"W x 18"L

Care instructions: machine wash cold, gentle cycle, and separately. Do not bleach. Tumble dry low, remove promptly, do not iron. If there is no free movement in the washer or dryer, use large capacity commercial washer/dryer.

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More
